China's Feb consumer prices rise 0.7% from year earlierChina's consumer prices rose for the first time in six months, providing some reprieve for the world's second-biggest economy, which faces sluggish demand, a property slump and high local government debt, although producer prices dropped. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:47:46 GMT 3B32KLSQQBP3LDHB3HQQCUGKDI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-feb-consumer-prices-rise-07-year-earlier-2024-03-09/Reuters市场宏观问题
As UN urges Sudan truce, Russia and China cite GazaThe United Nations Security Council on Friday called for an immediate cessation of hostilities in Sudan, prompting China to remind it not to forget about the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza and Russia to accuse the United States of double standards. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 22:15:40 GMT B7X3MIXOMBND7PMFF7C5PSNWTI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-urgent-sudan-truce-Russia-china-cite-gaza-2024-03-08/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
TikTok divestment bill would give government stronger legal position, US DOJ saysThe U.S. government would be in a stronger legal position if lawmakers ordered China's ByteDance to divest TikTok, rather than simply banning the short video app used by 170 million Americans, the Justice Department told Congress in a document seen by Reuters. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 19:52:52 GMT OQOJGWDRYZOCJCOQJCOLRSVMBE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/bytedance-tiktok-divestment-bill-would-give-government-stronger-legal-position-2024-03-08/David Shepardson可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Biden says he would sign TikTok crackdown, Trump raises concernsPresident Joe Biden said on Friday he would sign legislation that gives China's ByteDance about six months to divest the popular TikTok short video app as his rival Donald Trump raised concerns about a ban of the service used by 170 million Americans. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 16:03:27 GMT LF7JWBWIIBLEFOOWUG6IG35IRY https://www.reuters.com/technology/trump-raises-concerns-about-us-ban-tiktok-2024-03-08/David Shepardson, Nandita Bose技术
Scope of Hong Kong's new national security lawsHong Kong on Friday published its new national security draft law, a document that broadens the definition of crimes including sabotage, sedition and state secrets, and stipulates tougher penalties of up to life imprisonment. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 10:09:23 GMT YPBLR7NGOVLHDI4S3YJZMCPENU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/scope-hong-kong-new-national-security-laws-2024-03-08/James Pomfret世界中国
China's Xpeng's drone car AeroHT Voyager X2 completes low-altitude flight in Guangzhou cityChinese EV maker Xpeng's affiliate, XPENG AEROHT, said on Friday its flying drone car AeroHT Voyager X2 completed a low-altitude flight in the central business district of the southern city of Guangzhou, the company said in a statement. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 10:03:19 GMT 57PQKW5PFRKMDOWM3TVAMYP3I4 https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-xpengs-drone-car-aeroht-voyager-x2-complete-low-altitude-flight-2024-03-08/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China's February new yuan loans seen retreating from record highChina's bank lending likely pulled back sharply in February from an all-time high in January due to seasonal factors, a Reuters poll showed, even as the central bank seeks to spur sluggish economic growth and fight deflationary pressures. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 09:44:08 GMT L57CO2UYRKA3BFBJODSWBPORA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-february-new-yuan-loans-seen-retreating-record-high-2024-03-08/Reuters世界中国
Taiwan urges China not to alter situation around waters near frontline islandsTaiwan's top China policy-making body urged China on Friday not to change the "status quo" around waters near Taiwan's frontline islands by sending coast guard boats into restricted areas, saying tension should be "controllable". Fri, 08 Mar 2024 08:34:48 GMT 6WCOYZRHSJLPRM3ZG5ECAIYLLI https://www.reuters.com/world/taiwan-urges-china-not-change-status-quo-around-waters-near-kinmen-islands-2024-03-08/Yimou Lee, Fabian Hamacher世界
China says more Indian troops at Himalayan border won't ease tensionsChina believes that India's move to add more troops at their disputed border is "not conducive to easing tensions", a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 07:39:55 GMT VA4WC4IBUFK2NIMEDKG74W4V7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/more-indian-troops-will-ease-border-tensions-says-china-foreign-ministry-2024-03-08/Reuters世界
Article 23: what you need to know about Hong Kong's new national security lawsHong Kong's government on Friday unveiled its proposed national security bill, following a month-long public consultation that ended last week. City leaders want it to be swiftly passed, potentially within weeks. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 07:36:01 GMT 3GKDN5LOIVLK7DAULNZRF5C27E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/article-23-what-you-need-to-know-about-hong-kongs-new-national-security-laws-2024-03-08/Greg Torode, Jessie Pang世界亚太地区
Asian stocks draw massive foreign funds on China's reforms, AI surgeForeign investors poured substantial money into Asian equities in February amid a rebound in Chinese stocks following Beijing's rollout of reform measures and a surge in technology shares, driven by the artificial intelligence (AI) boom. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 06:41:12 GMT YOWJAP4KS5JLZEAXVPCHU3UDY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/asian-stocks-draw-massive-foreign-funds-chinas-reforms-ai-surge-2024-03-08/Gaurav Dogra市场亚洲市场
